attributes.action: INVESTIGATE AND SACK ALL UK MPS WHO HAVE FRAUDULENTLY USED TAXPAYERS MONEY TO PAY FOR THEIR OWN UNJUSTIFIABLE EXPENSE CLAIMS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ... JUST READ THE TELEGRAPH! THE POLICE SHOULD BE INVESTIAGTING UK MPS, NOT THE COMMONS INVESTIGATING THE TELEGRAPH. WOULD NOT ANOTHER POLICE INVESTIGATION WASTE MORE TAXPAYERS MONEY? PARTICULARLY IN THE CURRENT ECONOMIC CLIMATE. THERE IS NO MORAL JUSTIFICATION FOR THEIR FLAGRANT ABUSE OF THE LOOPHOLES IN THE EXPENSES REGULATIONS. THIS NATION HAS HAD ENOUGH.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
